title: Miracle Shoujo Limit-chan
synopsis: As a result of a traffic accident, Limit-chan is reborn as a cyborg and is given three types of supernatural powers. However, there is a catch: if she uses too much of them, her life will come to an end.
staff: [['Oosugi, Kumiko', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Kikuchi, Shunsuke', ['Music']], ['Komatsubara, Kazuo', ['Character Design', ' Animation Director']], ['Yukimuro, Shunichi', ['Screenplay']]]
